Key Match Events: Chet Holmgren suffered a pelvic fracture after contesting an Andrew Wiggins drive and is expected to be out for multiple months.
Post-Match Reflections: The Thunder will continue its road trip against the LA Clippers on Monday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Golden State's Buddy Hield and Stephen Curry made 48.8% of their 43 three-point attempts, with Curry adding seven triples on just 13 tries.
Others: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander shot 6-of-17 from the field, but was successful 12-of-14 from the free throw line.
